Adebayo Adedeji (21 Disemba 1930 na 25 Eprel 2018) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na agụmakwụkwọ

Onye prọfesọ zuru oke mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii, ọ bụ Federal Kommishiona nne Economic Development & Reconstruction nke Naịjirịa site na 1971 ruo 1975. Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka mmepe akụ na ụba na iwughachi nke Naịjirịa mgbe agha obodo gasịrị
Na June 1975, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke United Nations Economic Commission for Afrika ma nọgide n'ọkwa a ruo July 1991

Adedeji dere Lagos Plan of Action nke 1980 nke UN na OAU nabatara. Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, o guzobere Afrikan Centre for Development and Strategic Studies (ACDESS), ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-enweghị uru, ụlọ ọrụ na'iche echiche nke raara onwe ya nye ọtụtụ ọzụzụ na ọmụmụ atụmatụ na maka Africa
Ọ natara nsọpụrụ mba nke Commander of the Federal Republic.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri asatọ, ọ lara ezumike nká na ndụ ọha na eze ma nọrọ afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya n'ụzọ dị jụụ n'obodo ya bụ Ijebu-Ode, Ogun Steeti, Naijiria.
A mụrụ Adebayo Adedeji na 21 Disemba 1930 na Ijebu Ode, Naijiria.
Adedeji nwụrụ n'uhuruchi na 25 Eprel 2018 na Lagos mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge. UNECA nwere nnọkọ ncheta iji sọpụrụ ya na 7 Julaị na Lagos.
